name: reincarnation (littlepuly, abb2k)
description:
hi! 

in this game you play as a hero, trying to slay monsters for glory.

when you die, your soul will incarnate with the experience it gained in its past lives.

controls:

press left click on enemies to attack - you can hold the attack button for more damage.

press right click to defend and mitigate damage, your block is stronger the less time you hold down the button. 

I made the game with my wonderful friend abb2k, we had a lot of fun during development and we learned a lot. I made the art, sounds, and some code. and abb2k did most of the coding.

music:
"Big Mojo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
